                                 int order)

Parameters:
dep - Dependency label
order - rank order number
Returns:
DTNode, or null if no node met the requirements

getDepParent

public DTNode getDepParent(String dep)
Returns the ancestor with the given dependency label

Parameters:
dep - Dependency label
Returns:
DTNode, or null if there is no such ancestor

getParent

public DTNode getParent()
Returns the parent node. If there is more than one parent node (which in the DependencyTree there shouldn't really be), it returns a random choice.

Overrides:
getParent in class Node
Returns:
DTNode
